members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
This utility class contains a rich sets of utility methods that perform operations on objects during runtime such as copying of property and field values between 2 objects, deep cloning of objects, etc.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deep Comparison two objects if they are alike. The objects are consider alike if they are:
of the same ,
have the same number of methods, properties and fields
the public and private properties and fields values reflect each other's.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
